modName: PREDATOR Tactical Combat Bow and Arrow set
summary: Custom Textures for Bow and Arrow set. Perk tree requirements edited into higher tier items. Explosive arrows, High penetrator arrows, Magical arrows. Enchanted Bows. \'Elite\'-type O-P Bows. Unique custom Textures on all items including projectiles.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome, Assassin. This mod adds additional textures for the Daedric bow and the Ebony arrow set. This mod allows the crafting of my PREDATOR Bow series and PREDATOR Arrows WITHOUT any DLC required. There are Three colour patterns to choose from. Purple, Red and Blue (more colours are due to be released in next version, including Indigo and Green). There will be an Armour set to be released in next version also. Arrow set features matching colours.

Unique Viking-style Runes that have a neon \'glow\' effect are the trademark feature of this mod, this is intentional and not an actual light source. The arrows however DO have a corresponding coloured light source edited into the projectile data. This makes for some interesting screenshots!

STEAM WORKSHOP MOD DESCRIPTION. (Latest version)

 This is Version 1.2 of my original PREDATOR bow set. If you want to un-install the old mod, make sure you remove ALL OF THE ITEMS FROM YOUR\'S AND YOUR FOLLOWER\'S INVENTORY FIRST, THEN SAVE before removing the older version. You have to do this to avoid warning pop ups. Don\'t worry, you won\'t want the old bows!

N O T E :  You will not see the Weapons appear in the forge lists UNTIL you achieve the STEEL BLACKSMITH PERK (and onwards for higher tier items).

  This new version also features my trademark PREDATOR Arrows, made craft-able without requiring \'Dawnguard\' Dlc. The Bows and arrows can be crafted at any forge and require the Steel Perk as standard, in order to craft. Other items require higher tier perks of unlocking. They are listed in the weapon descriptions below:

21 versions of Bow (24 Total). I have NOT augmented the size of the Bows. Arrows available under MISC in Forge menu. Bows under Daedric.
There are perk requirements for certain models. Over-powered versions included, Various Bow String colours to choose. Certain Bows have Enchantments included in them. You can learn their enchantments, then swap them over to another bow if you so desire.

Enchanted Bows require the standard \'ARCANE BLACKSMITH\' Perk, in Blacksmith perk Tree. (Additional required perks are as listed per weapon).
Crafting ELITE Type Predator requires the First Perk, (\'Stealth\') in Sneak Perk Tree.

DISPENSER BOW: Deposits 9 arrows in addition to firing one. Arrows dispensed depends on arrow equipped. BEWARE, You cannot dispense explosive arrows, must be crafted separately. You have been warned. Any idiot who tries to dispense explosive Arrows by firing them infront of themselves will be blown away!

STRING VARIANTS:

PREDATOR Mk 1 A - G TACTICAL (BLUE BOW):
Black Visi-Tabs, RED, WHITE, BLUE

PREDATOR Mk 2 A - G TACTICAL (RED BOW):
BLACK, WHITE, RED, BLUE, GREEN

PREDATOR Mk 3 A - G Tactical (PURPLE BOW):
BLACK, WHITE, PURPLE, RED, KHAKI

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  . . . . ARROWS . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

PREDATOR BLUE RUNES ARROWS:
PERK REQUIREMENTS: (None)
Value: 10
Damage: 25
Effect: Blue Glow Emission. Increased penetration force
Noise: Silent
Crafting Count: 100

PREDATOR ICE SHARD:
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Arcane Blacksmith
Value: 12
Damage: 28
Effect: Shard of glowing Ice, penetrates Armour. Glows Blue
Noise: Minimal noise
Crafting Count: 50

PREDATOR ICE CHARGE:
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Arcane Blacksmith, Dwarven Smithing.
Value: 15
Damage: 35
Effect: Ice Shard Explodes into an ice storm on impact.
Noise: Very Loud
Crafting Count: 25

PREDATOR RED RUNES ARROW:
PERK REQUIREMENTS: (None)
Value: 10
Damage: 25
Effect: Bright Red Glow. Increased Penetration Force.
Noise: Silent
Crafting Count: 100

PREDATOR REDFIRE ARROW:
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Arcane Blacksmith, Glass Smithing.
Value: 16
Damage: 36
Effect: Detonates into a red explosive cloud, knocking all within the blast radius to the ground
and through the air.
Noise: Very Loud
Crafting Count: 25

PREDATOR PURPLE RUNES ARROW
PERK REQUIREMENTS: (None)
Value: 10
Damage: 25
Effect: Purple Glow emission. Increased penetration force.
Noise: Silent
Crafting Count: 100

PREDATOR SHOCK ARROW
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Arcane Blacksmith, Dwarven Smithing.
Value: 14
Damage: 27
Effect: Lightning Storm Bolt on impact
Noise: Very Loud
Crafting Count: 50

PREDATOR DAEDRIC BOUND ARROW
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Arcane Blacksmith.
Value: 14
Damage: 26
Effect: Ghostly Arrow-Retrieveable! Also emits a Purple Glow
Noise: Silent
Crafting Count: 75

 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . STANDARD TACTICAL BOW . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

PREDATOR: STANDARD TACTICAL COMBAT BOWS

- MK 1 - A,B,C,D, (BLUE)
- MK 2 - A,B,C,D,E, (RED)
- MK 3 - A,B,C,D,E, (PURPLE)

Value: 2,500
Weight: 5.0
Reach (melee stab): 1.3  (30% further reach)
Bow Draw Speed: 2.6  (2 and a half times faster than normal)
Damage: 22
Critical hit Damage: 10
Chance to Stagger: +1%  (You\'ll be surprised)

MK 1 - G,
MK 2 - F,
MK 3 - G.

Value: 3,000
Weight: 8.0
Reach: 1.3
Bow Draw Speed: 2.8  (Almost 3 times faster than normal)
Damage: 40
Critical Hit Damage: 20
Chance to score Critical Hit: 1.6
Chance to Stagger: 1.5  (50% chance to stagger opponent)

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . ENCHANTED TYPE BOWS . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 

PREDATOR MK 1 - E \'NECRO-KILLA\' :
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Glass Smith, Arcane Blacksmith.
Frost Damage: 15 points, Stamina Drain 50%. Magicka Damage: 15 points for 4 secs.
Shock Damage: 15 points damage, 7.5 points of Magicka drain

PREDATOR MK 1 - F \'UNDEAD\'S END:
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Orcish Smithing, Arcane Blacksmith
Undead up to lvl 20 - Confidence shaken. Shock Damage: 15 points to health.
Absorb 10 points of Stamina from Victim.

PREDATOR MK 2 - G \'IMMOLATOR\':
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Ebony Smithing, Arcane Blacksmith
Immolation: 15 Fire Damage for 4 secs, Absorb 10 points of Health from Victim.
Chance to Paralyse victim for 1 vital second.

PREDATOR MK 3 - F \'SHOCKWAVE\':
PERK REQUIREMENTS: Orcish Smithing, Arcane Blacksmith
Shock Dam, 20 pts. Chance to paralyse for 1 sec.

Enchanted Stats:
Weight: 6.0
Reach: 1.0
Bow Draw Speed: 1.5  (50% faster than normal)
Damage: 20
Chance to Hit Critical: 1.2  (20% Chance)
Critical Hit Damage: 9
Chance to Stagger: 1.2
